meanings.definition: Incorrect or unequal distribution of something.
meanings.sent1: The misdistribution of candies left some children with none.
meanings.sent2: The misdistribution of resources led to shortages in certain areas.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party's cake misdistribution caused laughter among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The misdistribution of sunlight in the room made it hard to read.
meanings.sent5: The misdistribution of colors in the painting created a chaotic effect.

meanings.definition: The act of distributing something improperly or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: The misdistribution of flyers resulted in confusion among the attendees.
meanings.sent2: The misdistribution of tasks caused inefficiency in the team.
meanings.sent3: The misdistribution of hats at the party made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The misdistribution of responsibilities made the project challenging to complete.
meanings.sent5: The misdistribution of prizes at the event caused disappointment among the participants.
